Choose another account as the default account

This action will change the status of this category. In the future, you can not see this category on the list of expense categories. It does not change the status of old transactions. Do you want to continue?

This action will change the status of this category. In the future, you can not see this category on the list of income categories. It does not change the status of old transactions. Do you want to continue?

This action will change the status of all subcategories. In the future, you can not see these categories on the list of expense categories. It does not change the status of old transactions. Do you want to continue?
